name: Pool
description: The Germantown YWCA pool was one of the most popular attractions within the building ever since its establishment.

name: Club Room
description: 1973-1975: Bottom club rooms were used for the Parent Cooperative Nursery School.

name: Gym
column8: has served as a venue for numerous programs over the years
column11: and various special events.Over the years
column12: the gym served many purposes. In the 1950s and ’60s
column16: including a balloon shaving station. From 1974 to 1986
column17: the Center for Older Adults Northwest used the space for daytime exercise and movement classes. The gym included three showers and 20 lockers. In the early 1950s
column18: weekly use included basketball on Monday evenings
column19: a sports club on Wednesday afternoons
column20: and Thursday morning sessions run by L.D.G. Groups using the space regularly contributed to heating and lighting costs. The gym was also used for events like the annual October rummage sale. When not in use by the Y
column21: Center in the Park held classes in the space.

name: Lounge
description: The lounge was a central gathering space in the Y. It featured an open fireplace and hosted everything from religious services to community conversations. In the 1950s and ’60s
column7: a semicircular welcome desk near the lounge helped manage entry into the rest of the building. From 1968 to 1985
column8: Center in the Park rented the lounge and used it as their main programming space. It hosted talks
column12: and also served as office space for the executive director
column15: the lounge continued as a weekday daytime gathering spot for the Center for Older Adults.

name: Lobby
description: The main lobby was a welcoming entry point into the building and featured an open fireplace that added warmth to the space. At the front of the lobby were two offices. The one closest to the entry steps was rented by the Center for Older Adults NW and used for both finance and development work
column7: making the lobby not only a social space but also a functional one for the Y’s operations.
